gold: In a survey conducted in December 2019 , the largest group of respondents indicated the the lack of opportunities to enter into the labor market as the main problem of Italian schools.
Furthermore , 21 percent of interviewees stated that the lack of funding and resources was a relevant problem in the Italian school system .
